item.title: Sculpture I Did Once
item.description: I actually have a degree in Fine Arts from Mass Art. When I went there I concentrated on sculpture, particularly figurative work of the creepy variety. This is a gallery of some of the work I did there.

item.title: Putting Yourself Out There
item.description: As long as I’ve been a software developer, I’ve yet to really put myself out there and create a personal website. That’s pretty rare, and some would say unacceptable for people in my line of work. So in an effort to grow a little and get over some of my hesitancy, I’ve decided to put up this site.
